mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prescriptions (id, treatment_id, medication_id, dosage, prescription_start_date, prescription_expiration_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{treatmentId}, #{medicationId}, #{dosage}, #{prescriptionStartDate}, #{prescriptionExpirationDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE prescriptions SET id = #{id}, treatment_id = #{treatmentId}, medication_id = #{medicationId}, dosage = #{dosage}, prescription_start_date = #{prescriptionStartDate}, prescription_expiration_date = #{prescriptionExpirationDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM prescriptions JOIN medical_records mr on prescriptions.treatment_id = mr.treatment_id JOIN appointments a on a.id = mr.appointment_id JOIN patients p on p.id = a.patient_id WHERE p.id = #{patientId};
